secondchat.config.title: Second Chat Configuration
secondchat.config.rules.tooltip: List of rules to filter chat messages (format: type:value, e.g., REGEX:hello or CONTAINS:hi)
secondchat.config.add_rule.tooltip: Enter the value for a new rule (e.g., 'hello' for CONTAINS or a regex pattern)
secondchat.config.rule_type.tooltip: Select the type of rule (REGEX or CONTAINS)
secondchat.config.message_lifetime.toolt: How long filtered messages stay on the HUD (1-60 seconds)
secondchat.config.hud_x_offset.tooltip: Horizontal offset from the right side of the window (negative to move left)
secondchat.config.hud_y.tooltip: Vertical position from the top of the window
secondchat.config.hud_background_color.t: Background color in hex format (e.g., #80000000 for semi-transparent black)
